name: Nocked! True Tales of Robin Hood - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for Nocked! True Tales of Robin Hood, composed by Ivan Oberholster and performed by Ivan Oberholster, Eric Lewis-Baker, and Salva Zaca. Includes the traditional Bruremarsj fra Valsoeyfjord, with Scandinavian fiddler Paul Carlson; and a special bonus track, the previously unrecorded "Living in the Greenwood" by Jon Boden (of Bellowhead and the Remnant Kings).

Track List
  • Enter Robin Hood (4:05)
  • The Sheriff of Nottingham (3:37)
  • A Partner in Arms (3:25)
  • The Old Oak Forest (3:24)
  • At the Faire (4:21)
  • The Scarlet Tower (4:29)
  • A Magical Crossing (3:46)
  • Stretch the Summer Eve (4:10)
  • Hills in Autumn (3:46)
  • The Raid (3:39)
  • Open the Doors (4:12)
  • An Exchange of Pleasantries (3:27)
  • Begin the Dance (4:41)
  • Lights in the Night (2:43)
  • Winter’s Chill (3:42)
  • Home in the Forest (4:00)
  • A Country Feast (3:45)
  • Success, or at least Survival (0:34)
  • The Inevitable Confrontation (3:25)
  • Farwell Old Friend (2:19)
  • Love in the Wood (2:45)
  • Bruremarsj fra Valsoeyfjord – traditional, feat. Paul Carlson (2:30)
  • As You Ever Have, and Always Will (1:49)
  • Living in the Greenwood - composed and performed by Jon Boden (4:17)
